Release History
===============

0.3.3 (2018-02-20)
------------------
- Python 2.7 supported
- Travis CI testing both Python 2.7 and 3.6.
- Backport Python 3.6 http.HttpStatus for support in Python 2.7 to Python 3.4.

0.3.2 (2018-02-16)
------------------
- migrate to github/TuneLab

0.3.1 (2018-01-25)
------------------
- migrate to github/tuneinc
